thread.title: LHG
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by LHG

author: LHG
title: LHG
text:
No problems, great customer service.
After less than a month the zip on the jacket I ordered broke. Customer service communication was quick and good. In no time a different brand of jacket was reserved then being sent to me.
Thank you country Attire
